The Rig Veda, written over 5,000 years ago, contains the earliest references to yoga.

Women were not invited to yoga classes until 1937! Nowadays, studies suggest that 72% of yoga practitioners are women and there is a strong movement of creating a space for more men to want to practice again.
The longest yoga lesson lasted 56 hrs 57 min and 21 sec and was achieved by K.P. Ranchana in India, from 19 to 21 June 2017.
George Harrison from The Beatles was a famous yogi. It was not a secret, as evidenced by his hit song, My Sweet Lord.

Tao Porchon-Lynch is the world’s oldest yoga instructor and shows no sign of slowing down as she embraces her second century with the same can-do attitude that has shaped her life. She says the secret to longevity is to live every day full of the “joy of life”.
